Package chess

Class ChessView

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
chess.ChessView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class ChessView extends javafx.application.Application implements Observer
This class is to show that GUI of Chess board. Without this View class, players are not be able to play the game. This class starts the actual game, updates the board when players click on the board, or take turns in black or white, In the middle of ChessView class, it is calling the HelpDiaglog.java class to show the help page, and calling the NetworkDialog.java class to show the Network setup diaglog.
Author:
Colin Johnson, Jiwon Seo, Kaichun Lee, Megan Herzog

    • letterSetUp

      private void letterSetUp​(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane pane, char letter, int x, int y)
      This method is to show the A~H letter and 1~8 number on the main board (Game Board). Repeating the same thing 4 tiems for each side on the board, so implemented as a method.
      Parameters:
      pane - GridPane that the letters or numbers are written
      letter - indicate whether it's '8' or 'A'
      x - checker to see if it's letter input
      y - checker to see if it's number input.
